headline: Is Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) The Best Stock to Buy and Hold For 10 Years?

headline: Franklin U.S. Focused Growth SMA Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Stock markets worldwide were turbulent over 1Q25, with major US equity indexes, the S&P 500 Index, Dow Jones Industrial Average and NASDAQ Composite Index, sustaining overall declines.
